title: Ep. 227 Charles Nenner: Why the Dow Jones Will Fall to 5,000
itunes:title: Charles Nenner: Why the Dow Jones Will Fall to 5,000
description: This week, Charles Nenner, founder and president of the Charles Nenner Research Group, joins S&A Investor Radio to talk about the market cycles that he has developed.Frank asks Charles to share insight to his former years as a market-timer at Goldman Sachs.Find out why he says the Dow Jones Index will fall to 5,000 in the years ahead.You'll hear him highlight deflation as his chief concern in today's market and he shares what his play is on gold right now... Then in the educational segment, Frank breaks down the term "Megaprojects" and why you should be paying attention to this trend.There's a boom in these projects and you'll get all the details.
